## InputProcessor interface

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

An input processor instance that can process content.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface InputProcessor 
```

## Remarks

Input processors convert various input formats (TypeScript, GraphQL, OpenAPI, etc.) into the normalized `Map<string, ExportedSymbol>` representation used by the change detector.
